## ssx-serverless package

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [SSXServer](./ssx-serverless.ssxserver.md) | SSX-Server is a server-side library made to work with the SSX client libraries. SSX-Server is the base class that takes in a configuration object to add authentication and metrics to your server. |
